summary: REQ-1 is partially addressed by adding a GlobalNeonBackground component and mounting it at the root so it appears behind all routes, with a prefers-reduced-motion media query hook. However, the diff summary does not provide evidence of the required CSS behaviors (non-intercepting pointer events, actual animation, reduced-motion behavior implementation, and contrast/legibility safeguards). REQ-2 is partially addressed by adding a reusable DrawerCloseButton and wiring it into multiple Sheet-based drawers, but the diff summary does not show evidence of slide-out close animation behavior or direction-specific slide-out matching the opening side.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the global animated neon/glow background layers do not intercept clicks/scroll/inputs (pointer events must not be blocked).
missing_requirements.reason: GlobalNeonBackground is added and mounted, but the diff summary does not show any CSS (e.g., pointer-events: none on background layers) or other implementation guaranteeing background layers won't capture interactions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide an animated neon/glow background effect site-wide with reduced motion support that disables or significantly reduces motion while retaining neon colors when prefers-reduced-motion is enabled.
missing_requirements.reason: The component toggles a 'reduced-motion' class based on prefers-reduced-motion, but the diff summary does not include the CSS/animation rules that actually animate the background or reduce/disable motion when 'reduced-motion' is present.
evidence: frontend/index.css (truncated; animation/keyframes for global-neon not shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Clicking the sidebar close (X) must close the sidebar and trigger a slide-out close animation (not an instant disappearance).
missing_requirements.reason: DrawerCloseButton closes by setting Sheet open state false, but the diff summary does not show any animation configuration (e.g., SheetContent animation classes) that ensures a visible slide-out animation on close rather than an instant unmount.

missing_requirements.requirement: Sidebar slide-out direction must match the opening side (left drawers slide out left; right drawers slide out right).
missing_requirements.reason: Header shows a right-side SheetContent, but the admin SheetContent side is truncated and there is no evidence of direction-aware close animations; direction correctness for both left and right drawers cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad UI theming and global CSS changes unrelated to the neon background requirement (e.g., extensive CSS variables for warm theme colors, Radix stacking/z-index rules, dialog/select/popper z-index adjustments).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on a global neon/glow animated background and sidebar close behavior; it does not request general theme palette overhauls or Radix stacking fixes.

hallucinated_features.description: Product/admin feature changes (e.g., AdminProductsPage/AdminNewsPage mutation authentication changes, new/updated INR price utilities and product price display components, products page category tab updates, asset URL normalization utility).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly exclude adding unrelated store features; these changes are not part of the neon background or sidebar close behavior requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation update about custom domain setup and rebuild/redeploy guide reference.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest, which is explicitly a frontend UI change for neon background and sidebar close behavior.
